title: Noam Chomsky "brags" about debating McGeorge Bundy and getting thrown out of teach-in
description:
As part of a larger interview about the New Left and 1960s, we have a clip here with Professor Noam Chomsky "bragging" about challenging McGeorge Bundy at a Teach-In on Vietnam at M.I.T. in 1968, and getting thrown out because he got the best of Bundy!


Full interview coming soon.  Please subscribe to the Green and Red YouTube Channel.
